bookTitle: Real Love: The Drawings for Sean
bookAuthors: John Lennon, Al Naclerio, Yoko Ono
Plot: John Lennon was a singer, songwriter, political activist, and humanitarian. But to Sean Lennon, he was Daddy. Drawing pictures and making up funny descriptions was one of the ways they played together. It's also one of the ways John was able to express his love for and great joy in his son. Full color.
